/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.member.repository.master.MbMemberInterestStoreDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE mb_member_interest_store
member_no = #{memberNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_no = #{siteNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_no = #{storeNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE member_no = #{memberNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND site_no = #{siteNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND store_no = #{storeNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
